content: winter stroll socks by marie-elyse dugal ravelry tipoussins instagram @marieelysedugal #winterstrollsocks inspired by the peaceful winter walks in the woods i love to take alone or in good company these socks have little flurries at the cuff and a simple meditative repeat on the leg and foot a quick cozy project in squishy dk yarn to warm your feet as you stroll outdoors all winter long page �1 of �11 yarn and notions yarn 100g - 225 yards dk sample in tabby dk sock set by alley cat yarns 100g plus 30 g mini colourway coast set needles 3 mm long cable for magic loop or dpns if preferred gauge 7 sts = 1 inch in stockinette sizes s m l xl to fit foot circumference of 8 8 1/2 9 9 3/4 inches notions stitch marker cable needle needle for grafting and scissors abbreviations k knit p purl ktbl knit through the back loop ssk slip slip knit slip the next 2 stitches consecutively as if to knit then return these stitches to left needle and knit them together through the back loop k2tog knit 2 stitches together skpo sl knit pass the sl stitch over the knit one yo yarn over p2sso pass the 2 sl stitches over usually in a pattern after having sl2 then k1 sl slip_stitch purl wise with yarn held in back unless specified sl wyb slip_stitch as above purl wise with yarn held in back sl wyf slip_stitch purl wise with yarn held in front co cast on bor beginning of round marker pm place marker page �2 of �11 instructions note that charted instructions for the pattern repeats can be found at the end of all written instructions cast on 48 52 56 60 stitches using your preferred method such as long tail or german twisted separate stitches equally in two 24 26 28 30 per needle if using magic loop or equally on 4 dpns or at your preference cuff joining in the round place bor marker and begin the 1x1 twisted rib *ktbl p1 repeat from * to end of round repeat this rib pattern for a total of 4 rounds snowflakes round 1 knit to end round 2 knit to end round 3 *k2 2 2 2 skpo yo k1 yo k2tog k3 3 4 5 skpo yo k1 yo k2tog x2 k1 3 3 3 repeat from * a second time round 4 knit to end round 5 *k3 3 3 3 yo sl2 k1 p2sso yo k5 5 6 7 yo sl2 k1 p2sso yo x2 k2 4 4 4 repeat from * a second time round 6 knit to end round 7 *k2 2 2 2 skpo yo k1 yo k2tog k3 3 4 5 skpo yo k1 yo k2tog x2 k1 3 3 3 repeat from * a second time round 8 knit to end round 9 knit to end round 10 knit to end repeat the 4 row of twisted rib *ktbl p1 repeat
